divs: Sighting DetailsI was sitting on the marfa lights platform and watching the lights closely.I then noticed the lights when someone told me. When I first noticed it, I thought it was a car. Then I remember there were no mountains seen above the tower. Then I knew it was a marfa light or a UFO. There were two lights orbiting one another over the tower and stayed there for an hour before disappearing. After all that I was amazed. It disappeared out of thin air. It lasted for an hour.
Summary: There were two lights orbiting one another over a tower.
trends: There have been 4 other sightings in Marfa
There were no other sightings in Marfa on or around June 19th 2011
